author: FourFourTwo
description: Gianluigi Buffon praised the "sacrifice and dedication" of the Juventus squad after they topped Serie A for the sixth straight year.
title: Elated Buffon delighted by 'beautiful' history-makers Juventus

author: FourFourTwo
description: Xavi feels Real Madrid have practically secured LaLiga after beating Celta Vigo, but he is backing Gianluigi Buffon and Juventus in Europe.
title: Barcelona great Xavi concedes Real Madrid have LaLiga in their grasp
